unittitle_ssm: Trente-deux reproductions des maquettes en couleurs, d'après les originaux des costumes & décor par Picasso pour le ballet "Le Tricorne"
abstract_ssm: Reproductions of Picasso's watercolor designs for the ballet Le Tricorne (The Three-Cornered Hat), issued by Éditions Paul Rosenberg, Paris, 1920. To request this item for research, and for fuller details about it, please read its catalog record, or write to printroom@nyhistory.org.
